Key Arguments: The bill threatens freedom of expression for Australians.
Government overreach into citizens' lives is a concern.
Distrust in government, politicians, and bureaucrats to accurately determine misinformation and disinformation.
Comparison of the bill to communism.
Politicians themselves are accused of spreading misinformation.
Notable Quotes: This Bill is a huge overreach of Government into the lives of Australians.
It is all about control and appears to have a strong resemblance to Communism.
If our politicians/bureaucrats cannot speak the truth, why should they have any right to determine what is misinformation and disinformation?
